title: Mandate Lap Dances
itunes:title: Mandate Lap Dances
description:
Today on the show we opened the phone lines to see how our listeners felt about the mask mandate being lifted in some states. Also, based off a bachelorette scene on the show "Married at First Sight" we opened the phone lines to see if any of our listeners would feel away if their partner got a lap dance at a bachelore/bachelorette party. In fact, they had a caller who was not letting that ish fly at all when it comes to her partner.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show we opened the phone lines to see how our listeners felt about the mask mandate being lifted in some states. Also, based off a bachelorette scene on the show "Married at First Sight" we opened the phone lines to see if any of our listeners would feel away if their partner got a lap dance at a bachelore/bachelorette party. In fact, they had a caller who was not letting that ish fly at all when it comes to her partner.
